channel.title: I need some help. [Flooded]
channel.description:
Yeah I keep getting this guy on my server - saying go to rune-kill.no-ip.biz.
First off, he has the command to "::yell" when in reality,
you have to do "::say". And I don't think he's checked up on it because it's still going.
I ip'd both his addresses he's using, but he still floods the command prompt box that comes up when you run the server. And nobody can log on. -.-
If you wanna see a picture,
[IMG]http://i233.photobucket.com/albums/ee303/magiklyfe/hl.jpg[/img]
=/

item.title: I need some help. [Flooded]
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

Yeah well I’ve done that, but this kid has some sort of program that just keeps logging him in. Oi! I am looking now, and see this:

Connection from 212.95.32.219:33231 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (212.95.32.219)

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help. [Flooded]
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

close the whole server for 5 mins

then try to run again

get’s rid of my spammers

Read full topic
